name: Vennominaga the Deity of Poisonous Snakes

Rulings.Edison:
●Removing from play 1 Reptile-Type monster in your GY to Special Summon this card is a cost.
●This card’s effect to place 1 Hyper-Venom Counter on itself starts a chain when it inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent.
●When 3 Hyper-Venom Counters are placed on this card, its controller wins the Duel as part of the resolution of the effect.
●This card is not affected by the effects of any other Monsters, Spells or Traps, even effects that don't target.
●If Skill Drain is already active on the field when Vennominaga is Special Summoned, the effect of Vennominaga is negated.
●This card can be Tributed normally for a Tribute Summon, or for the cost of another card. It can't be Tributed as part of the resolution of a card's effect, like Ectoplasmer.
●You can Tribute your opponent's Vennominaga to Summon Lava Golem.
●If this card is destroyed by battle with Dark Ruler Ha Des, Dark Ruler Ha Des' effect negates this card's effect in the GY, and it Cannot be Special Summoned.
●Please note the spelling of this card’s name. It is not a “Venom” monster.

Rulings.Base:
1. Removing from play 1 Reptile-Type monster in your GY to Special Summon this card is a cost.
2. This card's effect to place 1 Hyper-Venom Counter on itself starts a chain when it inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent.
3. When 3 Hyper-Venom Counters are placed on this card, its controller wins the Duel as part of the resolution of the effect.
4. This card is not affected by the effects of any other Monsters, Spells or Traps, even effects that do not target.
5. If "Skill Drain" is already active on the field when Vennominaga is Special Summoned, the effect of Vennominaga is negated.
6. This card can be Tributed normally for a Tribute Summon, or for the cost of another card. It cannot be Tributed as part of the resolution of a card's effect, like "Ectoplasmer".
7. You can Tribute your opponent's Vennominaga to Summon "Lava Golem".
8. If this card is destroyed by battle with "Dark Ruler Ha Des", the effect of "Dark Ruler Ha Des" negates this card's effect in the GY, and it cannot be Special Summoned.
9. Please note the spelling of this card's name. It is not a 'Venom' monster.
